metadata.title: Lumo - Simple Rent Tracking
metadata.description: Lumo helps small landlords stay organized by tracking rent, rooms, and tenants in one simple app. No spreadsheets, no stress.
metadata.keywords: rent tracking, landlord app, property management, small landlord, rent reminder

hero.badge: Peace of mind for property owners
hero.headline: Rent tracking, made simple
hero.subtext:
Lumo helps you stay organized. No spreadsheets, no stress.
Track rooms, payments, and tenants in one calm place.

features.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't
features.subtitle: Simple tools designed for managing your rentals

items.title: Track rooms & tenants
items.description: See all your rooms and who's renting them in one simple view

items.title: See payment status clearly
items.description: Know instantly who has paid and who hasn't. No digging through files

items.title: Built for you, not companies
items.description: Designed for property owners, not property management companies

items.title: Forgetting rent dates
items.description: Missing payments because there's no easy way to track who paid and when

items.title: Messy spreadsheets
items.description: Excel files that grow confusing over time, with formulas breaking unexpectedly

items.title: Paper notes everywhere
items.description: Scattered notebooks and sticky notes that are easy to lose or misplace

solution.title: There's a simpler way
solution.description: Lumo is purpose-built for individual property owners. It's calm, simple, and helps you stay on top of your rentals without the complexity

cta.title: Ready to simplify your rental tracking?
cta.subtitle: Join property owners who are leaving spreadsheets behind

waitlist.description: Be the first to know when Lumo launches.
